data.title: God bless Steven Zaillian and his Netflix series "Ripley" shot in Italy
data.meta_description: Steven Zaillian, beloved screenwriter of such films as "Saving Private Ryan" and "Mission Impossible", returns to Netfilx with a new miniseries, "Ripley."
data.text:
News

GOD BLESS STEVEN ZAILLIAN AND HIS NETFLIX SERIES “RIPLEY” SHOT IN CAPRI, ROME AND VENICE

867

Steven Zaillian, beloved screenwriter of such films as “Saving Private Ryan” and “Mission Impossible” from (1996), returns to Netfilx with a new eight-episode thriller miniseries, “Ripley.” Adapted from Patricia Highsmith’s “The Talented Mr. Ripley,” “Ripley” was filmed in Italy and more specifically in Capri, Rome and Venice. Announced in 2019, the series will be distributed from this April.

Steven Zaillian Capri Hollywood 2019
